name: Technical assistant / Certification & Documentation
description:
Technical assistant / Certification & Documentation.

ROTATION 56/21, Belokamenka region

Requirements:

  • 1 or 2 Years of relevant experience in technical document control, quality etc.
  • Must have good experience in maintaining databases, using various sources of data
  • Experience in reporting
  • ACCESS Database is a must, Excel – advanced, MS Pack Office, Adobe
  • Good data analyst/communications skills, possible bilingual (English/Russian)
  • English- Upper-Intermediate

Responsibilities:

  • To consolidate data related to certification documents and dossiers required for compliance to Russian Regulations,
  • To track and report daily, weekly, monthly the progress of documentation in preparation, submittal and acceptance of said documents and dossiers, against the plan,
  • To coordinate with Contractor Departments at Site: As-Built Documentation Team, Precom/Com, Handover/Completion, Field Engineering, Project Control in order to get the key data reporting for input in database,
  • Transfer data from paper formats into computer files or database systems using keyboards, data recorders or optical scanners
  • Type in data provided directly from customers
  • Create and or spreadsheets with large numbers of figures without mistakes
  • Verify data by comparing it to source documents
  • Retrieve data from the database or electronic files as requested
  • Perform regular backups to ensure data preservation
  • Sort and organize paperwork after entering data to ensure it is not lost

Condition:

  • Working for one of the largest Oil&Gas construction projects of federal importance;

  • 56/21 rotation, 6 days working week, 10 hours working day (2 hours lunch break);
  • Room and workplace in a Construction site camp;
  • Meal&accomodation;
  • 100% official salary, compensation of travel expenses, official employment, fixed term extendable labor contract;
  • Private medical insurance, provision of PPE & PC;
  • Highly professional international team.
